item.title: V2 Protocol & Security
item.description: This is a guide for early adopters who wish to test and study the Version 2 Protocol and Security project. Warning This is a Hard Mode guide that does everything manually and with no Configuration Management. Requirements Choria Nightly Choria AAA Service Nightly Choria Provisioner Nightly Docker on Intel CPU Security Credentials Security is by means of a ed25519 key that signs JWTs, some JWTs form a chain and can sign others.
